summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2013 FORD FUSION. WHILE DRIVING 70 MPH, THE ENGINE TEMPERATURE INDICATOR CHIMED AND THE COOLANT LEVEL WAS LOW. THE CONTACT CALLED A LOCAL DEALER (GRIFFIN FORD LOCATED AT 1940 E MAIN ST WAUKESHA, WI 53186 262-542-5781) AND WAS INFORMED THAT THE RECALL REMEDY PARTS WERE ON BACKORDER. THE CONTACT WAS INFORMED THAT THE VEHICLE WAS NOT ABLE TO BE SERVICED UNTIL JUNE 22, 2017 AT 7:00 AM. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE, BUT WAS UNABLE TO OFFER ANY ASSISTANCE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 61,000. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE.
